title: ATRFinancial
author: ATRFinancial
content: ATR (All the Time Rewards) MAIN FEATURES:-Automatic Staking and Compounding in Your Wallet!-Highest Fixed APY in Crypto – 383,025.80%-Get auto rewards every 15 minutes-100% benefits of first months will invested in marketing-Automatic true burn in every transactions-Insurance fund and treasury for the project-Coming in Arbitrum Network, holders of ATR BNB will have airdrop and whitelist for ATR ArbitrumATR provides a decentralized financial asset which rewards users with a sustainable fixed compound interest model through use of it’s unique SAP protocol. ATR delivers the industry’s highest fixed APY, paid every 15 minutes, and a simple buy-hold-earn system that grows your $ATR portfolio in your wallet at a lightning fast pace.BENEFITS FOR HOLDERSAll holders will have a vote in future project decisions and will receive airdrops from ATR Arbitrum, additionally all will be on the pre-sale whitelist at the launch of atr on arbitrum.WEBSITEhttps://atr.financial/TELEGRAMhttps://t.me/atrfinancialCONTRACT ADDRESS0x80D0dD57b38644CFC2CF514feBB6ece652D93b1F

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: First move this to Altcoin discussion. I guess this is your ANN thread. I don't really think this auto compounding is really of good choice this day's. How long do you really think this can last until the entire place is being flooded with tokens that won't worth anything in the market.
